song.title: I Can't Go Wee Wee
song.info:
Well, I got myself some trouble with the missus, as you'll see. She's forcing me to sit down every time I gotta pee, But that's not the way to go for a man. I stand up when I pee because I can.
I can't go wee wee when I sit, 'Cause then my body wants to shit.
She says she won't be putting out until I obey, But that's no trouble for a real man like me. If she's hard to get, I grab my coat And head out to the barn and fuck a goat.
I can't go wee wee when I sit, 'Cause then my body wants to shit. If I have to fuck the goat to (??? have my way) Then that's the simple way it's gonna be.
Well, I got myself some trouble with the missus, as you'll see. She's forcing me to sit down every time I gotta pee. I guess that darn ol' goat is getting tired of me now, So next week I think I'll have a go at the cow.
I can't go wee wee when I sit, 'Cause then my body wants to shit.
